patterns: What are the different colleges in UNP?
What are the different colleges in unp?
Can you provide me a list of colleges?
provide me a LIST of colleges
i want to know the colleges of the University of Northern Philippines
give me list of the colleges that unp is offering.
responses:
The University of Northern Philippines has the following colleges:

College of Architecture (CA)
College of Arts and Sciences (CAS)
College of Business, Administration and Accountancy (CBAA)
College of Computing and Information Technologies (CCIT)
College of Criminal Justice Education (CCJE)
College of Fine Arts and Design (CFAD)
College of Health Sciences (CHS)
College of Hospitality and Tourism Management (CHTM)
College of Law (CL)
College of Medicine (CM)
College of Nursing (CN)
College of Engineering (COE)
College of Teacher Education (CTE)
College of Public Administration (CPA)
College of Technology (CTech)
College of Social Work (CSW)
